00012 // iwuvbr3
00013 // Interworking Unit, which accepts frames and lets them out
00014 // according to SCR and PCR, each connection can set its own
00015 // SCR and PCR, which are met by the Queues for SCR and PCR
00017 class iwuvbr3 : public inxout {
00018    typedef   inxout   baseclass;
00019 
00020    public:   
00021 
00022    enum {keyPCR = 1};
00023 
00024    iwuvbr3() : evtPCR(this, keyPCR)
00025    {
00026       TimeSendNextPCR = -1.0;
00027       TimeSendNextSCR = -1.0;
00028       alarmed_late = FALSE;      // not alarmed
00029       alarmed_early = FALSE;
00030       SCRReserved = 0;
00031       connected = FALSE;
00032       buff=0;
00033    }  // Constructor
00034    
00035    struct inpstruct
00036    {
00037       data *pdata;
00038       int inp;
00039    };
00040 
00041    int ninp;            // # of inputs
00042    int max_flow;        // number of Flows
00043    int connected;
00044    int maxbuff;
00045    int buff;
00046 
00047    event evtPCR;        // Event to call the output with PCR
00048 
00049    uqueue QSortScr;     // sort queue for SCR
00050    uqueue QSortPcr;     // sort queue for PCR
00051 
00052    double IncreaseFactor;  // how much to increase PCR every packet
00053    double WQ;           // Weighting parameter for expo mov average or ARate
00054    double pcrthr;       // threshold, at which rate fall back to switch off PCR
00055    int NAllowExcess;    // at how many packets to start allow PCR
00056    int Clp0Shap;        // shaping of clp=0 packets yes/no
00057    int MTU;             // maximum size of packets
00058    int UseARate;        // use the calculation of ARate or not?
00059    int UseItOrLooseIt;  // Use It or Loose It policy
00060    
00061    int alarmed_late;    // alarmed for late phase?
00062    int alarmed_early;   // alarmed for elary phase?
00063 
00064    IWUConnParam **connpar;
00065 
00066    double TimeSendNextPCR;
00067    double TimeSendNextSCR;
00068    
00069    double SlotLength;   // Length of 1 Slot in seconds
00070    double SCR;          // SCR of the connection
00071    double PCR;          // PCR of the connection
00072    double SCRReserved;  // reserved SCR Rate
00073 
00074    enum {SucData = 0};
00075    inpstruct *inp_buff;    // buffer for cells arriving in the early slot phase
00076    inpstruct *inp_ptr;     //current position in inp_buff
00077 
00078    // Methods
00079    void init(void);
00080    rec_typ REC(data*,int);
00081    void late(event*);
00082    void early(event *);
00083    inline void  dropItem(inpstruct *);
00084    int export(exp_typ *);
00085    int command(char *,tok_typ *);
00086    void connect(void);
00087    inline double SlotToTime(int t){return t*SlotLength;};

00089 }; // class iwuvbr2

00093 // class IWUConnParam
00094 // Connection parameters for iwuvbr3
00095 // Contains two SortItems, which are used in the queues for
00096 // SCR and PCR
00098 class IWUConnParam {
00099 
00100    public:
00101    
00102    IWUConnParam(int flow);
00103 
00104    uqueue q_data;       // the queue, where the data (frames) are queued
00105    SortItem *SIScr;     // to sort for SCR
00106    SortItem *SIPcr;     // to sort for PCR
00107 
00108    //int QLenByte;      // QLen in bytes for this flow
00109    
00110    double SCR;          // the SCR of this flow (fixed)
00111    double PCR;          // the PCR of this flow (variable)
00112    double ARate;        // arriving rate of this flow
00113    int LastATime;       // the last arriving time of this flow
00114    
00115    double SendTimeSCR;  // the next sending time of this flow regarding SCR
00116    double SendTimePCR;  // the next sending time of this flow regarding PCR
00117    int LastSendTimePCR; // the last sending time of the PCR queue
00118 
00119    int lost;
00120    int maxbuff;
00121 };
